A Spring component that provides mapping functionality between internal tool data models and external DTOs for the OpenFrame tool management system.

## Key Components

- **@Component ToolMapper** - Spring-managed mapper service for tool-related transformations
- **toToolResponse()** - Converts IntegratedTool entities to ToolResponse DTOs
- **toToolsResponse()** - Maps ToolList containers to ToolsResponse DTOs with collections
- **toToolFilterResponse()** - Transforms ToolFilters to ToolFilterResponse DTOs
- **toToolFilterOptions()** - Converts ToolFilterCriteria to ToolFilterOptions for queries
- **Private helper methods** - Handle nested object mapping for URLs, credentials, and API keys

## Usage Example

```java
@Autowired
private ToolMapper toolMapper;

// Convert single tool entity to response DTO
IntegratedTool tool = toolRepository.findById(toolId);
ToolResponse response = toolMapper.toToolResponse(tool);

// Convert tool collection with null safety
ToolList toolList = toolService.getAllTools();
ToolsResponse toolsResponse = toolMapper.toToolsResponse(toolList);

// Map filter criteria for search operations
ToolFilterCriteria criteria = new ToolFilterCriteria();
criteria.setEnabled(true);
criteria.setCategory("DEVELOPMENT");
ToolFilterOptions options = toolMapper.toToolFilterOptions(criteria);
```

The mapper includes comprehensive null-safety checks and handles complex nested objects like tool URLs, credentials, and API key configurations. All mapping methods use the builder pattern for clean DTO construction.
